abstract: David Pogue is baffled by Apple’s latest version of its iMovie video-editing software.
snippet: David Pogue is baffled by Apple’s latest version of its iMovie video-editing software.
lead_paragraph: Last week, Apple released a new version of its iLife suite—its $80 package containing iPhoto, iMovie, iWeb and GarageBand. The suite also comes preinstalled on every new Mac.

headline.main: Apple Takes a Step Back With iMovie ’08
headline.kicker: From the Desk of David Pogue
